availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on April 7, 1835. Nelson County, Kentucky. Attorney. Married to Ophelia Wilson McKay. Children included Harry, Garnello, Ophelia, Emily, Sallyand Amanda. Died on January 17, 1913 in Bardstown, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Bardstown, ED 205, sheet 192C; "Find A Grave Index," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QVGK-BF54 : 13 December 2015), Enoch Edwin McKay, 1913; Burial, Bardstown, Nelson, Kentucky, United States of America, Bardstown City Cemetery; citing record ID 126126057, Find a Grave, http://www.findagrave.com.
